author: gjsexehwbvwgsv
title: Been having problems with service
review: Somehow in the last couple months.  I have been going through 30 gigs of data and have no clue what has changed as far as why I‚Äôm using so much data but they have begun throttling down the speeds and cellular survices once I go past 30 gigs which is their ‚Äúunlimited plus‚Äù plan this is the same thing all the other company‚Äôs have done in the past which led to me going to spectrum. This wasn‚Äôt the case with spectrum before and it shouldn‚Äôt be now. to me an unlimited plan should truly be unlimited no matter what you‚Äôre charging for it if I sign up for an unlimited plan, I should get unlimited anything and everything that is included in that plan. I suggest Spectrum fix this, or they‚Äôre going to start losing business.
